name: Bread

pages.text: To make $(thing)Bread$(), one first must get $(thing)Yeast$(). To get your first yeast, seal $(l:firmalife/drying)Dried Fruit$() in a Barrel of $(thing)Water$(). After three days, $(thing)Yeast Starter$() will form.$(br)From now on, your yeast can be fed by sealing Yeast Starter in a Barrel with $(thing)Flour$(). This causes it to multiply. 1 flour per 100mB of Yeast produces 600mB of Yeast. That's a good deal!
Yeast Starter, Sweetener, and Flour can be combined to make $(thing)Dough$(). Dough can be cooked like normal to produce $(thing)Bread!$().

pages.title: Sliced Bread
pages.text: Once baked, you can use a $(thing)knife$() to cut bread into $(thing)slices$(). These can then either be used for $(l:tfc:mechanics/sandwiches)sandwich making$(), or cooked into $(thing)toast$() which can be spread with $(thing)butter$() or preserves.
